name: Agent IA de Trading Quantitatif Tesla utilisant Telegram + GPT-4.1 (Interface Principale)
description:
üìà **Recevez des signaux de trading quotidiens et √† la demande pour Tesla (TSLA) via Telegram‚Äîaliment√© par GPT-4.1 et des donn√©es de march√© en temps r√©el.**
Ceci est le superviseur IA central qui orchestre sept sous-agents pour l'analyse technique, la reconnaissance de motifs de prix et le sentiment des nouvelles. Les rapports sont livr√©s dans un HTML structur√© pr√™t pour Telegram, optimis√© pour les traders cherchant des signaux de prise de d√©cision rapides et intelligents.

‚ö†Ô∏è Cet agent ma√Ætre **n√©cessite 7 sous-flux de travail connect√©s** pour fonctionner. L'un d'eux, l'Agent de Nouvelles et de Sentiment, n√©cessite √©galement une **cl√© API DeepSeek Chat** pour le traitement du langage.

---

## üîå Sous-Flux de Travail Requis

Vous devez t√©l√©charger et publier les flux de travail suivants :

1. **[Outil d'Analyse des Donn√©es Financi√®res de Tesla](https://n8n.io/workflows/4094-tesla-financial-market-data-analyst-tool-multi-timeframe-technical-ai-agent/)**
2. **[Outil d'Analyse des Nouvelles et du Sentiment de Tesla](https://n8n.io/workflows/4093-tesla-news-and-sentiment-analyst-tool-powered-by-deepseek-chat/)** *(N√©cessite une cl√© API DeepSeek Chat)*
3. **[Outil des Indicateurs de 15 minutes de Tesla](https://n8n.io/workflows/4096-tesla-15min-indicators-tool-short-term-ai-technical-analysis/)**
4. **[Outil des Indicateurs de 1 heure de Tesla](https://n8n.io/workflows/4097-tesla-1hour-indicators-tool-mid-term-technical-analysis-ai/)**
5. **[Outil des Indicateurs de 1 jour de Tesla](https://n8n.io/workflows/4098-tesla-1day-indicators-tool-macro-level-technical-ai/)**
6. **[Outil des Klines de 1 heure et 1 jour de Tesla](https://n8n.io/workflows/4099-tesla-1hour-and-1day-klines-tool-candlestick-and-volume-ai-pattern-detector/)**
7. **[Outil des Webhooks des Indicateurs Techniques Quantitatifs de Tesla](https://n8n.io/workflows/4095-tesla-quant-technical-indicators-webhooks-tool/)** *(N√©cessite une cl√© API Alpha Vantage Premium)*

üìç Voir tous les outils √† :
üîó **[https://n8n.io/creators/don-the-gem-dealer/](https://n8n.io/creators/don-the-gem-dealer/)**

---

## üîç Ce que fait cet agent

1. √âcoute votre requ√™te de trading via Telegram
2. Appelle l'**Analyste Financier** et l'**Analyste des Nouvelles et du Sentiment**
3. Ces agents agr√®gent :

   * RSI, MACD, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX
   * Analyse des motifs de chandeliers + divergence de volume
   * R√©sum√©s des nouvelles et scoring de sentiment via **DeepSeek Chat**
4. GPT-4.1 compose le rapport structur√© final **de trading TSLA** avec :

   * Configurations de spot et de levier
   * Raison du signal
   * Score de confiance
   * √âtiquette de sentiment
   * R√©sum√© des nouvelles

---

## üß† Exemple de Sortie

**Rapport de Trading TSLA (R√©sum√© Quotidien)**
**Trade Spot**
‚Ä¢ Action : Acheter
‚Ä¢ Entr√©e : 172.45
‚Ä¢ TP : 182.00
‚Ä¢ SL : 169.80
‚Ä¢ Signal : rebond RSI + Englobant Haussier
‚Ä¢ Sentiment : Neutre

**Position √† Effet de Levier**
‚Ä¢ Position : Long
‚Ä¢ Levier : 3x
‚Ä¢ TP : 186
‚Ä¢ SL : 170
‚Ä¢ Confiance : √âlev√©e (83/100)

üì∞ **Principales Nouvelles**
‚Ä¢ Augmentation des livraisons du Model Y de Tesla ‚Äì Electrek
‚Ä¢ Le march√© des options anticipe une hausse ‚Äì Bloomberg
‚Ä¢ FSD retard√© au Canada ‚Äì TeslaNorth

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Instructions de Configuration

### 1. Importez Tous les 8 Flux de Travail

Assurez-vous que tous les sous-agents ci-dessus sont publi√©s dans votre instance n8n.

### 2. Cr√©ez Votre Bot Telegram

Utilisez [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) pour g√©n√©rer le token et vous connecter aux n≈ìuds de d√©clenchement/envoi.

### 3. Connectez OpenAI GPT-4.1

Ajoutez vos identifiants OpenAI pour GPT-4.1 dans le n≈ìud d√©sign√©.

### 4. Ajoutez la Cl√© API DeepSeek Chat

Inscrivez-vous sur [https://deepseek.com](https://deepseek.com) et ins√©rez vos identifiants **DeepSeek Chat** dans l'Agent de Nouvelles.

### 5. Ajoutez la Cl√© API Alpha Vantage Premium

Inscrivez-vous sur [https://www.alphavantage.co/premium/](https://www.alphavantage.co/premium/)
Utilisez l'authentification par en-t√™te HTTP pour les r√©cup√©rateurs d'indicateurs bas√©s sur des webhooks.

### 6. Remplacez l'ID Telegram

Mettez √† jour le placeholder <<remplacez votre ID ici>> avec votre ID num√©rique Telegram r√©el dans le n≈ìud d'authentification.

---

## üìå Notes Collantes Incluses

‚úÖ Configuration du Bot Telegram

---

## üé• Agent IA Quant Tesla ‚Äì D√©mo en Direct

workflow.name: Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent n8n

options.systemMessage: You are the **Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent**, responsible for generating structured, professional swing-trading reports for **TSLA** based on both **real-time technical analysis** and **curated sentiment data**. --- ### üîó Connected Tools: 1. **Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool** - Aggregates multi-timeframe indicators + candlestick signals from: ‚Ä¢ Tesla 15min Indicators Tool ‚Ä¢ Tesla 1h Indicators Tool ‚Ä¢ Tesla 1d Indicators Tool ‚Ä¢ Tesla Klines Tool (1h & 1d pattern/volume) - Uses Alpha Vantage indicators: **RSI, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX, MACD** - Each tool returns the **20 most recent points**, cleaned and trimmed - Pattern logic: detects **Doji, Engulfing**, and **volume divergence** 2. **Tesla News and Sentiment Analyst Tool** - Scrapes from trusted RSS sources: **Google News, Yahoo Finance, Electrek, CleanTechnica, TeslaNorth** - Returns: ‚Ä¢ **Sentiment score**: Bullish / Bearish / Neutral ‚Ä¢ **Summary**: 2‚Äì3 sentence narrative ‚Ä¢ **Top 3‚Äì5 Headlines** (with sources) --- ### üìä Responsibilities: 1. **Ingest structured inputs** from the tools listed above: - Indicator values and candlestick/volume behavior - News sentiment summaries and headlines 2. **Perform technical analysis** across timeframes: - **Short-Term**: 15m + 1h - **Long-Term**: 1d + 1h - Assess trend, support/resistance, divergence, and reversal signals - Confirm with lagging indicators and macro sentiment alignment 3. **Generate two trade strategy sections**: Spot Recommendations ‚Ä¢ Action: Buy / Sell / Hold ‚Ä¢ Entry Price ‚Ä¢ Stop Loss ‚Ä¢ Take Profit ‚Ä¢ Rationale: ‚ÄÉ- Primary Signals: e.g. candle pattern, breakout ‚ÄÉ- Lagging Indicators: RSI, BBANDS, etc. ‚ÄÉ- Sentiment & Macro Analysis: use news summary + headlines Leveraged Recommendations ‚Ä¢ Position: Long / Short ‚Ä¢ Leverage: 2x / 3x / 5x ‚Ä¢ Entry Price ‚Ä¢ Stop Loss ‚Ä¢ Take Profit ‚Ä¢ Rationale: ‚ÄÉ- Primary Price Action Signals ‚ÄÉ- Lagging Indicator Confirmation ‚ÄÉ- Sentiment & Macro Analysis 4. **Score your signal strength** ‚Ä¢ Confidence score (0‚Äì100) ‚Ä¢ Strength label: Low / Medium / High / Very High 5. **Include sentiment and headlines** at the bottom of the report: ‚Ä¢ A short News Sentiment Summary ‚Ä¢ Top 3 Tesla-related headlines with bullet formatting --- ### üßæ Output Format (Telegram HTML) Start your message with: TSLA Analysis Use: ‚Ä¢ `` for bold headers ‚Ä¢ `‚Ä¢` for bullet points ‚Ä¢ Clean line breaks --- ‚ö†Ô∏è DO NOT: ‚Ä¢ Fabricate or assume any data ‚Ä¢ Repeat this prompt or system instructions ‚Ä¢ Include raw JSON or raw API format in your output Only use what is provided via structured input. Write like a seasoned quantitative analyst.

nodes.name: Splits message is more than 4000 characters

parameters.content:
## Trigger Incoming Telegram Command

This node **listens for new Telegram messages** to initiate report generation.

## Validate User Access

Ensures only **authorized Telegram user IDs** can trigger the agent.

## Capture Timestamp

Captures the **current system date and time** for session tracking and report stamping.

## Generate Session Metadata

Assigns **sessionId based on Telegram chat ID** and stores current **date/time** for context continuity.

## Main AI Agent: Trading Report Generator

Uses **GPT model to combine technical and sentiment data** into a structured **TSLA swing-trading report**.
Calls **Financial Market Analyst + Sentiment Analyst**.

## Handle Telegram Message Limits

Checks **output message length and splits into 4000-character** chunks if needed.

## Send Final Report to Telegram

Sends **formatted HTML report (or split parts)** back to the **original Telegram user**.

## GPT Model for Reasoning
Uses **OpenAI GPT (e.g., GPT-4o)** to process signal analysis and produce **final report** text.

## Short-Term Memory Module
Maintains **state during session**. Helps agent **track message history and previous context**.

## Fetch Technical Indicator Insights
Calls all **15m, 1h, 1d, and Klines sub-agents** via **webhook** to retrieve structured **market analysis**.

## Scrape Tesla News & Generate Sentiment
Pulls latest **Tesla-related headlines from trusted RSS feeds** and **returns structured sentiment** summary.

# üß† Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent ‚Äì Full System Documentation

A professional-grade AI-driven stock analysis system designed to deliver structured Tesla (TSLA) swing-trading insights based on real-time technical indicators and sentiment signals.

---

## üß© Included Workflows

> Download and install **all** of the following workflows for the system to function correctly.

| Workflow Name                               | Function                                                                 |
| ------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| ‚úÖ Tesla 15min Indicators Tool               | Pulls Alpha Vantage data for short-term signals (15m: RSI, BBANDS, etc.) |
| ‚úÖ Tesla 1hour Indicators Tool               | Pulls Alpha Vantage data for medium-term signals (1h: RSI, BBANDS, etc.) |
| ‚úÖ Tesla 1day Indicators Tool                | Pulls Alpha Vantage data for long-term signals (1d: RSI, BBANDS, MACD)   |
| ‚úÖ Tesla 1hour & 1day Klines Tool            | Analyzes candlestick patterns and volume divergences (OHLCV)             |
| ‚úÖ Tesla Quant Technical Indicators Webhooks | Webhook handlers that power the above 4 indicator-fetching tools         |
| ‚úÖ Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool  | Synthesizes multi-timeframe indicator + candle data                      |
| ‚úÖ Tesla News and Sentiment Analyst Tool     | Scrapes Tesla news RSS + assigns sentiment with headlines                |
| ‚úÖ Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent              | Final agent that generates Telegram-style trade reports                  |

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation Instructions

### Step 1: Import Workflows

1. Open your **n8n editor UI**.
2. Import each workflow JSON file one by one.
3. Make sure all workflows are **activated** or properly linked via `Execute Workflow` nodes.

### Step 2: Set Up Credentials

1. Go to **Credentials ‚Üí HTTP Auth ‚Üí Query Parameter Auth**.
2. Create a credential named: `Alpha Vantage Premium`

   * Add: `apikey=YOUR_API_KEY`
3. Add your **OpenAI API** credentials (for GPT-4.1 or equivalent).

### Step 3: Configure Webhooks

1. Deploy the **Tesla Quant Technical Indicators Webhooks Tool**.
2. Ensure that `/15minData`, `/1hourData`, `/1dayData`, and `/klinesData` routes are properly reachable.

### Step 4: Set Up Execution

1. Trigger the **Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent** manually or via a scheduler.
2. The agent will:

   * Call all technical + sentiment tools via workflow execution
   * Format and analyze data
   * Output full trading report in Telegram-HTML style

---

## üñ•Ô∏è System Overview

**Data Flow:**

```
[Webhook HTTP Trigger] 
‚Üí [Indicator Tool (15m, 1h, 1d)] 
‚Üí [Candlestick Tool (1h, 1d)]
‚Üí [Financial Market Data Analyst] 
‚Üí [Sentiment Analyst] 
‚Üí [Final Report Generator]
```

**Output Example:**

* Spot + Leverage trade entries
* Confidence score (0‚Äì100)
* Reasoning: price action, indicators, and sentiment
* Summary headlines and sentiment context

---

## üì¨ Output Format

* Styled using Telegram HTML (`<b>`, `‚Ä¢`, newlines)
* Structured trade report with:

  * Action type
  * Entry/exit prices
  * Rationale in 3 parts
  * News sentiment and 3 headlines

---

## üöÄ Support & Licensing

üîó **Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn**
[http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company. All rights reserved.
This AI workflow architecture, including logic, design, and prompt structures, is the intellectual property of **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**. Unauthorized reproduction, redistribution, or resale is prohibited under **U.S. copyright law**. Licensed use only.
